import React, { useState } from 'react' import Dropdown from '../../../components/forms/dropdown.component' import Switch from '../../../components/forms/switch.component' const tabs = [ { name: 'Create', href: '#', current: true }, { name: 'Read', href: '#', current: false }, { name: 'Update', href: '#', current: false }, { name: 'Delete', href: '#', current: false }, ] const steps = [ { id: 'Step 1', name: 'Job details', href: '#', status: 'current' }, { id: 'Step 2', name: 'Application form', href: '#', status: 'upcoming' }, { id: 'Step 3', name: 'Preview', href: '#', status: 'upcoming' }, ] const sizing = [ { id: 1, val: ['S', 'M', 'L'] }, ] const colours = [ { id: 1, val: 'Black'}, { id: 2, val: 'Blue'}, { id: 3, val: 'Green'}, { id: 4, val: 'Purple'}, { id: 5, val: 'Violet'}, { id: 6, val: 'Indigo'}, { id: 7, val: 'Pink'}, { id: 8, val: 'White'}, ] const categories = [ { id: 1, val: 'Blazer'}, { id: 2, val: 'Blouse'}, { id: 3, val: 'Shirt'}, { id: 4, val: 'Bodysuit'}, { id: 5, val: 'Jumpsuit'}, { id: 6, val: 'Playsuit'}, { id: 7, val: 'Romper'}, { id: 8, val: 'Dress'}, { id: 9, val: 'Hoodie'}, { id: 10, val: 'Sweatshirt'}, { id: 11, val: 'Jacket'}, { id: 12, val: 'Leggings'}, { id: 13, val: 'Lingerie'}, { id: 14, val: 'Sets'}, { id: 15, val: 'Shorts'}, { id: 16, val: 'Skirt'}, { id: 17, val: 'Sportswear'}, { id: 18, val: 'Sweater'}, { id: 19, val: 'Swimwear'}, { id: 20, val: 'Trousers'}, { id: 21, val: 'Tops'}, { id: 22, val: 'Underwear'}, ] function classNames(...classes) { return classes.filter(Boolean).join(' ') } const ProductsAdmin = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState(); const submitProduct = () => { console.log('Form submitted!'); } const [colour, setColours] = useState(colours[0]) const [category, setCategory] = useState(categories[7]) return (
{/* Use an "onChange" listener to redirect the user to the selected tab URL. */}
{tabs.map((tab) => ( {tab.name} ))}
    {steps.map((step) => (
  1. {step.status === 'complete' ? ( {step.id} {step.name} ) : step.status === 'current' ? ( {step.id} {step.name} ) : ( {step.id} {step.name} )}
    2. ))}
